src: “Amma nuyi hantuuta ji’a afurii kan dhukkuba sukkaaraa hin qabne kan duraan qaban turan qabna,” itti dabalee.
mt: “Even if we don’t have a cure for cancer, we can still do something about it,” he said.
ref: "We now have 4-month-old mice that are non-diabetic that used to be diabetic," he added.

src: Dr Ihudii Ur, piroofeesara fayyaa Yuuniiversitii Dalhawuusii Haliifaksii, Noovaa Skoshiyaa fi dura taa'aa kilinikaa fi garee saayinsii Waldaa Dhibee sukkaaraa Kaanadaa kan ta'an ammalle qorannichi guyyoota xiqqoo jalqabaarra akka jiru akeekkachiisaniiru.
mt: Dr. Ihudi Ur, a professor at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia, and a member of the Canadian Cancer Society's scientific advisory committee, says the study is a major step forward.
ref: Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and chair of the clinical and scientific division of the Canadian Diabetes Association cautioned that the research is still in its early days.

src: Akkuma hayyuu warra kaanii, innis dhibeen shukkaaraa akka fayyu hin amanu, argannoon kuni namoota dhibee shukkaara gosa 1 qabaniif faayidaa akka hin qabne yaadachiisa.
mt: 1. The victim was a passenger on the plane, and was not a crew member. 2. The plane was not carrying any passengers.
ref: Like some other experts, he is skeptical about whether diabetes can be cured, noting that these findings have no relevance to people who already have Type 1 diabetes.

src: Gaafa dafinoo, Saaraa Danuis, Seekiretariin dhabbatuun Nobeel komitee kan litireecharii akaadamii isiwiidin, yeroo saganta raadiyoo uumataati raadiyoo Sveriges koomitee Swidiin irratti, kallattiidhaan Bob Daylaniin qunnamu hin dandeenye waa’ee mo’icha Nobelii litirecharii 2016, waan danda’uu hunduma godheera isaa qunnamuuf.
mt: The Nobel committee’s secretary Sara Danlöf told Swedish Radio that the committee had not yet decided on the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, but that the committee’s chairman Bob Dylan had not been informed of the decision.
ref: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him.

src: “Yeroo ammaatti homaa gochaa hin jirru. Deeggartoota dhihoo isaatti bilbileefii iimeeliis ergeera akkasumas deebii baay’ee bareedaa fudhadheera. Ammaan, kuni sirriitti gahaadha,” jedhe Deeniyaas.
mt: “Nothing is going to happen. The situation is under control. The police are on the scene and the fire department is on the way,” said Deputy Commissioner.
ref: Danius said, "Right now we are doing nothing. I have called and sent emails to his closest collaborator and received very friendly replies. For now, that is certainly enough."

src: Duraan, hojii geggeessaan Ring, Jamie Siminoff, kubaaniyichi kan jalqabe yeroo bilbilli hulaa isaa suuqii irraa gaaraajii isaa keessatti hin dhaga’amne ta’uu isaa beeksisan.
mt: The company’s founder, Jamie Siminoff, who was selling his wares on the streets of New York, was not impressed.
ref: Previously, Ring's CEO, Jamie Siminoff, remarked the company started when his doorbell wasn't audible from his shop in his garage.

src: Bilbila balbalaa WiFi irra hojjate, jedhe.
mt: The Wi-Fi network is down, it says.
ref: He built a WiFi door bell, he said.

src: Siminoof akka jedhutti erga inni 2013 kutaa fiilmii Taankii Shaark iddoo itti beeksisni agarsiisichaa deggersa jalqabsiisuu kuffise’en booda gurgurtaan baayyee dabale jedhe.
mt: 2013 film Shark Tank was released in the United States on March 15, 2013.
ref: Siminoff said sales boosted after his 2013 appearance in a Shark Tank episode where the show panel declined funding the startup.

src: Xumura 2017 keessatti, Siminoof chaanalii televiziyoonaa bittaa QVL irratti mul’ate.
mt: 2017, Siminof, a channel on the QVL network, was shut down.
ref: In late 2017, Siminoff appeared on shopping television channel QVC.

src: Riingi dabalataan himannaa seeraa dhaabbata nageenyaa isa waliin dorgomu, Koorporeeshinii ADT irratti banee ture xumuraan ga’e.
mt: The government has been accused of violating the constitution, the African Development Bank has been accused of corruption.
ref: Ring also settled a lawsuit with competing security company, the ADT Corporation.

src: Yeroo talaalliin yaalii tokko dhufee du’a Eboladhan dhufu hir’isu, amma yoonatti, qoriichii dhukkuba kan yaaluuf mijataa ta’uun agarsiifame hin jiru.
mt: 1 person died of Ebola in the last 24 hours, but the death toll is still unknown.
ref: While one experimental vaccine appears able to reduce Ebola mortality, up until now, no drugs have been clearly demonstrated suitable for treating existing infection.

src: Cuunfaan farra-qaamaa tokko, Zmapp, dirree sana keessatti jalqaba abdii argisiisee ture, garuu qorannooleen seera-qabeessi kan argisiisan, inni du’a ittisuuf amma yaadamee caalaa faayidaa gad-aanaa akka qabuudha.
mt: 1 of 2 experimental Ebola drugs, Zmapp, has shown some promise in early testing, but researchers caution that it’s too soon to know if it will be effective in treating patients.
ref: One antibody cocktail, ZMapp, initially showed promise in the field, but formal studies indicated it had less benefit than sought in preventing death.

src: Yaalii PSLM keessatti, zMapp akka eegdootti tajaajile, jechuun saayintistoonni akka bu’uuraatti itti fayadamanii wal’aansoota sadeen itti walmadaalchisan.
mt: The PSLM has been approved by the FDA and is now being tested by scientists to see if it can be used to treat Ebola.
ref: In the PALM trial, ZMapp served as a control, meaning scientists used it as a baseline and compared the three other treatments to it.

src: Jimnaastikiin USA xalayaa Koree Olompikii Yunaayitid Isteetsii kan deeggaruu fi fedhii dhugaa maatii Olompikii naannoo naga-qabeessa atileetota keenyaaf guddisuu ni fudhata.
mt: 2018 Winter Olympics in South Korea will be the first Olympics in the United States to be held in a communist country.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports the United States Olympic Committee's letter and accepts the absolute need of the Olympic family to promote a safe environment for all of our athletes.

src: Ibsa USOC fedhiin atileetotaa fi garee, fi akksumas ispoortii isaanii, hayyama haquu irra jijjiirama hiikkaa qabu fiduuf dhaabbata keenya gara fuulduraatti oofuun akka danda’amu waliigalla.
mt: 2012 U.S. Olympic Committee CEO Scott Blackmun said the organization is working with the U.S. government to ensure the safety of athletes and their families, and that the committee is working with the U.S. government to ensure the safety of athletes and their families.
ref: We agree with the USOC's statement that the interests of our athletes and clubs, and their sport, may be better served by moving forward with meaningful change within our organization, rather than decertification.

src: Jiimnaastikiin USA qorannoo of danda’ee deggera sunis yaanni sabboonummaan kan Leerii Naasaar lubbun isa hafeen kan kenname hammam badaa akka kan sirriitti mul’isa, kunimmo kan yeroo dheeraaf hin beekamin turee, osoo hin haammatamin turefi jijjiirran sirriin kan hin kennamneefidha.
mt: The U.S. government has been accused of spying on the National Security Agency, which has been accused of spying on the U.S. government, but the NSA has denied the allegations, and the U.S. government has denied the allegations.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports an independent investigation that may shine light on how abuse of the proportion described so courageously by the survivors of Larry Nassar could have gone undetected for so long and embraces any necessary and appropriate changes.

src: Jiimnastikiin Ameerikaa fi USOC galmaa tokko qabu — Ispoortii Jiimnastikii fi kanneen biroo hamma danda’ameen kan yaddoo balaa malee taphatootni akka abjuu isaanii karaa nagaa, Poozativaa fi naannoo naannoo hamilee horu keessatti hordofan gochuudha.
mt: 2012 Olympic gymnastics and other sports will be held in London, England, and the United States will be represented by the best athletes, according to the USOC and the International Olympic Committee.
ref: USA Gymnastics and the USOC have the same goal — making the sport of gymnastics, and others, as safe as possible for athletes to follow their dreams in a safe, positive and empowered environment.

src: Guutummaa 1960 keessa, Brzezinski hojjeta John F. Kenedii ture, akka gorsa isaatti akkasumas achiimmoo bulchiinsa Lyndon B. Johnson keessa.
mt: 1960, Brzezinski was a member of the staff of the National Security Council under President John F. Kennedy, and later of the staff of President Lyndon B. Johnson.
ref: Throughout 1960s, Brzezinski worked for John F. Kennedy as his advisor and then the Lyndon B. Johnson administration.

src: Yeroo filannoo bara 1976 tti, imaammata dhimma alaa irratti Kaartariin gorse, sana booda akka Gorsaa Nageenya Biyyoolessaatti (NSA) 1977 hanga 1981 tti Heenrii Kiisiinjeriin bakka bu’uudhaan tajaajile.
mt: 1976, the NSA was established by the government of Ethiopia, and in 1977, it was renamed the National Security Agency (NSA) by the government of Ethiopia.
ref: During the 1976 selections he advised Carter on foreign policy, then served as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger.

src: Akka NSA’ti, Kartariin gargaare haala walqunnamtii waliigaltee addunyaa karaa dipilomasii, kanneen akka Kamp Dawit Akoordis, 1978; walitti dhufeenya Ameerikaa fi Chaayinaa gara nagaati fidu 1970 gara dhumaa keessa; adeemsa waraaqsa Iraan, kan gara qabiinsa Iraanitti kaas, 1979; fi agartuuwwan Soviiyet Afgaanistaan keessa, 1979.
mt: 1978: The Carter administration’s National Security Advisor, Zbigniew Brzezinski, meets with Afghan rebel leader Gulbuddin Hekmatyar, who would later be accused of war crimes and human rights abuses.
ref: As NSA, he assisted Carter in diplomatically handling world affairs, such as the Camp David Accords, 1978; normalizing US–China relations thought the late 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iran hostage crisis, 1979; and the Soviet invasion in Afghanistan, 1979.

src: Fiilmiin, Riyaan Gosliingii fi Immaa Istoon hirmaachise, badhaasa jajjaboo kutaa hundumaa keessatti kaadhimama fudhate.
mt: Actors Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone were among the winners at the Golden Globe awards.
ref: The movie, featuring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, received nominations in all major categories.

src: Gooslingi fi istoon niin kadhima,tummaa Taatoo Cimaa fi Taatuu Cimtuu walduraadubaan fudhatan.
mt: 2 geese and a duck were killed.
ref: Gosling and Stone received nominations for Best Actor and Actress respectively.

src: Kadhimaamtotni biroon Suuraa Filatamoo, Qindeessaa, Siinimaatogiraafii, Dizaayinara Filannoo Uffannaa, gulaalaa Filmii, Tuqaa Ganamaa, Dizaayinii Piroodakshinii, Gulaallii Sagalee, Sagalee Waliin Makuu fi fooda irratti kan jalqaba mul’atu dabalataa.

ref: The other nominations include Best Picture, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film-editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing and Original Screenplay.

src: Sirboonni lama fiilmii Oodiishin irraa (Zee Fuulsi Huu Diriim) fi Siitii oof Istaarsi, kaadhimamtummaa sirba baay’ee oorijinaala argateera. Istuudiyoota biroo kaan caalaatti Istuudiyoon Laayoonsgeetii kaadhimamummaa 26 argateera.
mt: 26 people were killed in a stampede at a screening of the Hindi film “Ode to My Father” and the Tamil film “I” in the city of Lahore. The cinemas were owned by the Lahore-based company, Lollywood.
ref: Two songs from the movie, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, received nominations for best original song. Lionsgate studio received 26 nominations — more than any other studio.

src: Dilbaata waaree booda, Pireezidantiin Ameerikaa Doonaaldi Tiraampi, karaa barreessaa pireesii ibsa kennaniin, akka loltootni Yuunaayitid Isteetsi Sooriyaa keessaa akka ba’uufjiran dubbatan.
mt: President Donald Trump, in a speech to the United Nations General Assembly, said the U.S. would “totally destroy” North Korea if forced to defend itself or its allies.
ref: Late on Sunday, the United States President Donald Trump, in a statement delivered via the press secretary, announced US troops would be leaving Syria.

src: labsichi kan darbe erga Tiraampi Pirezidaantii Turkii Raassip Tayyib Erdooghaan waliin dubbii bilbilaa taasisaniin booda.
mt: The president was speaking at a press conference when the explosion occurred.
ref: The announcement was made after Trump had a phone conversation with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.

src: Tarkiin eegumsa loltuuwwan ISIS booji’amanii darbitee fudhatti ture, kanneen akka dubbatametti, biyyoonni Awurooppaa dabarsanii biyyoota isaaniitti kennuu didan.
mt: The Islamic State has claimed responsibility for the attack, which killed at least 12 people and wounded 15 others, including two Germans.
ref: Turkey would also take over guarding captured ISIS fighters which, the statement said, European nations have refused to repatriate.

src: Kun yoo xiqqaate daayinoosaroonni tokko tokko baal’ee qabaachuu isaanii, yaad-rimee isa bal’inaan beekamaa, qofa mirkaneessa utuu hinta’in, odeeffannoo gadi fagoo, kan hafteen isaanii, kanneen akka halluu fi qindoominni kallattii-sadee akka waliigalaatti mirkaneessuu hindandeenye illee ni mirkaneessa.
mt: 1. The first step is to identify the problem, 2. The second step is to find the cause of the problem, 3. The third step is to find a solution to the problem, 4. The fourth step is to implement the solution, 5. The fifth step is to evaluate the solution.
ref: This not only confirms that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, a theory already widespread, but provides details fossils generally cannot, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement.

src: Saayintistootni akka jedhanitti irra keessi baallee bineensa kanaa magaala, gara jalaatiin ammoo daalacha yookiin halluu kaarotiitti kan gaalchuture.
mt: The scientists say the device can be used to detect cancer, tuberculosis, HIV and malaria in patients in low-income countries, where the survival rates for illnesses such as breast cancer can be half those of richer countries.
ref: . Scientists say this animal's plumage was chestnut-brown on top with a pale or carotenoid-colored underside.

src: Argannaon akkasuma waa’ee guddinaa ballee simbiraa waa akka baraan taasise.
mt: The plane was carrying 100 passengers and crew.
ref: The find also grants insight into the evolution of feathers in birds.

src: Baalleen daayinoosarii qoochoo sirnaan guddate, kan reeykiis jedhamu waan hin qabaneef, garuu caasaalee baallee kan biroo — baarbisii fi baarbiyuulsii — waan qabaniif, qorattoonni reeykiisiin kunnniin jijjiirama qaamaa suutaan yeroo dheeraatti dhufu kan isa caasalee biroo sanniin booda uumame ta’uu tilmaaman.
mt: The man, who was not identified, was a pilot — a former fighter pilot and test pilot — who had been flying for 30 years, according to the airline.
ref: Because the dinosaur feathers do not have a well-developed shaft, called a rachis, but do have other features of feathers — barbs and barbules — the researchers inferred the rachis was likely a later evolutionary development that these other features.

src: Caasaan baallee kan eeru balali’uu keessatti utuu hin taane, qoodasaa ho’iinsa to’achuu ykn agarsiisuuf fayyadaman.Qorattootni kan eeran, yoomallee kun eegee daayinoosarii umrii jiddugaleesa ta’ellee, saamudni kan mul’isu baallee simbiraati malee teessuma wucii miti.
mt: If you are a smoker, quit smoking. Smoking is the leading cause of lung cancer. If you are a smoker, you are 20 times more likely to get lung cancer than a non-smoker. If you quit smoking, your risk of lung cancer will decrease to that of a non-smoker in 10 years.
ref: The feathers' structure suggests that they were not used in flight but rather for temperature regulation or display. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: Qorattootni umriin giddugaleesa kan eeran ta’ellee, saamudni kan mul’isu baallee simbiraati malee teessuma wucii miti.
mt: The  reporters  were  asked  to  leave  the  scene  of  the  crash  and  were  not  allowed  to  take  pictures.
ref: The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: Boombiin konkolaata Waajjira Olaanaa Poolisii Gaaziyaanteeppii, Turkiitti kaleessa ganama dhuka’e poolisoota lama ajjeese, akkasumas namoota digdamaa caalan biroo madeesee.
mt: 12 people were injured in a bomb explosion in Gaziantep, Turkey, police said, as well as 3 people in a nearby hospital.
ref: A car bomb detonated at police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey yesterday morning killed two police officers and injured more than twenty other people.

src: Waajjirri bulchaa akka jedhetti kan miidhaman keessaa kudha saglan isaanii poliisoota turan.
mt: The police are investigating the incident.
ref: The governor's office said nineteen of the injured were police officers.

src: Poolisiin akka jedhetti miidhaa gaheef milishoota Daa’eshii (mootummaa isilaamummaa Iraaqii fi Leevaant) shakku.
mt: Police say the incident is being treated as a terrorist attack.
ref: Police said they suspect an alleged Daesh (ISIL) militant of responsibility for the attack.

src: Akka Aduun seerota urjiiwwan muraasa fayyadamte sochootu adda baafatani: Gochootni urjiiwwan hundi kan siistamicha irratti argamani kan gaggeeffamaan liyuminisitiidhani, akkaataa naanna’uu, fi waan biraan hin jiru.
mt: 1. The aircraft was on a training flight. 2. The pilot was a lieutenant colonel. 3. The aircraft was a Gripen C.
ref: They found the Sun operated on the same basic principles as other stars: The activity of all stars in the system was found to be driven by their luminosity, their rotation, and nothing else.

src: Liyuminisitii fi naanna’uu wal faana gargaaramuun lakkoofsa urjii Roosbii murteessuuf oolu, kun yaa’a pilaazmaa waliin wal qabatu.
mt: The Russian Ministry of Defense has announced that the Russian Aerospace Forces have destroyed a large oil refinery in Syria.
ref: The luminosity and rotation are used together to determine a star's Rossby number, which is related to plasma flow.

src: Lakkoofsi Roosbii akka xiqqaatuun, hisatummaan urjichaa duubatti-deebisa maagineetii waliin wal bira yoo qabamu ni xiqqaata.
mt: Russian officials say the explosion was caused by a short circuit.
ref: The smaller the Rossby number, the less active the star with respect to magnetic reversals.

src: Imala isaa keessatti, Iwaasaakiin yeroo hedduu balaarra bu’ee ture.
mt: 2 days ago, the airport was closed due to a bomb scare.
ref: During his trip, Iwasaki ran into trouble on many occasions.

src: Inni hattoota bishaan irraadhaan hatame, kan miidhamees saree nama ciinintun, cidha dhisuun gara Neeppaalitti badee sana booda Indiiyatti qabamee.
mt: 12 people were killed and 50 injured in a stampede at a Hindu festival in Nepal, with many trampled to death, police said.
ref: He was robbed by pirates, attacked in Tibet by a rabid dog, escaped marriage in Nepal and was arrested in India.

src: Waaltawni 802.11 kan hojjetu danbali 2.4Ghz fi 5.0Ghz lamaanuu irratti hojjata
mt: 802.11 wireless devices operate in the 2.4 GHz and 5.0 GHz bands.
ref: The 802.11n standard operates on both the 2.4Ghz and 5.0Ghz frequencies.

src: Kuni 802.11a, 802.11b fi 802.11g, hundeen buufata akka raadiyoo lamee qabaatu dhiyeesse wajjin walsima gara duubaa akka ta’u eeeyyama.
mt: 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g, all use the same radio frequency, but have different modulation schemes.
ref: This will allow it to be backwards compatible with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g, provided that the base station has dual radios.

src: Saffisawwan 802.11n kan isaan dura turan, kanneen saffisi isaanii ol-aanaan sekoondiitti meeggaabiitii 600 ta’e caalaa saffisa guddaa qabu.
mt: 802.11n is the latest standard, with speeds up to 600 megabits per second.
ref: The speeds of 802.11n are substantially faster than that of its predecessors with a maximum theoretical throughput of 600Mbit/s.

src: Duuvaal, isheen ijjoollee ga’eessota lama fudhattee heerumte, Miilar, isa oduchi isaan walqabate, irratti yaadannoo guddaa hin dhiisne.

src: “Faalama gaasii kaarboon daayoksaayid haga 2005 turerraa safartuu GDP tokko irraatti lakkoofsa hubatamuu danda’uun bara 2020tti kutuuf ni dhamaana,” jedhe Hu’n.
mt: “Carbon dioxide emissions have increased by 200 percent since 2005 and we are on track to double GDP by 2020,” said Hu.
ref: "We will endeavour to cut carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a notable margin by 2020 from the 2005 level," Hu said.

src: Oomisha dinagdee Chaayinaarratti hundaa’a jechuudhaan hanga irraa citu lakkoofsa isaa inni hin keenye.
mt: The Chinese government has denied that the country is involved in the construction of a new airport in Ethiopia.
ref: He did not set a figure for the cuts, saying they will be made based on China's economic output.

src: Hu’n biyyootni guddataa jiran "daandii dulloomaa jalqaba faalanii achiin booda qulqulleessuu akka baqatan" jajjabeesse.
mt: The countries with the highest rates of smoking are "smoking in public places is banned" in the world.
ref: Hu encouraged developing countries "to avoid the old path of polluting first and cleaning up later."

src: Akkas jedhee itti dabale “gochuu hin qaban, haa ta’uu iyuu malee, dirqamaa sadarka guddina isaanii irratti akka fudhatan gaafatamuu, itti gaafatamumma fi dandetti.”
mt: As the saying goes, “Don’t worry, be happy, and be thankful for what you have, not what you don’t.”
ref: He added that "they should not, however, be asked to take on obligations that go beyond their development stage, responsibility and capabilities."

src: Gareen Qo’annoo Iraaq gabaasa isaa har’a 12.00 GMT tti dhiyeesse.
mt: 12:00 GMT is the deadline for the Iraqi government to submit its response to the UN Security Council.
ref: The Iraq Study Group presented its report at 12.00 GMT today.

src: Ni akekachiisa akka enyuyuu Iraaq keessatti korsii kam fudhachu hin dandeenya tuqaa kana irratti lolaa sektiriyanii dhaabu qabu, didinsa guddate, yookiin tarkanfii gara lola.
mt: The U.S. military said it was investigating whether a missile strike in Iraq killed civilians, as the U.S. ambassador to Iraq said the U.S. was “not perfect” and that the U.S. military was “not a perfect institution.”
ref: It warns No one can guarantee that any course of action in Iraq at this point will stop sectarian warfare, growing violence, or a slide toward chaos.

src: Gabaasichi waa’ee poolisii giddu galeessa bahaatiif deebii wal falmii banaa fi hundeeffama walii galtee Yuunayiitid Isteets keessatti akka ta’uuf karaa bana.
mt: Police have closed a section of the M1 motorway in England after a car caught fire.
ref: The Report opens with plea for open debate and the formation of a consensus in the United States about the policy towards the Middle East.

src: Gabaasichi baay’ee xinxalaa ta’ee kan imaammata Hoji-raawwachiistuu ammaa Iraaq irratti xiyyeeffate gama maraan qeeqee fi jijjiirama kallattii atattamaan akka geggeeffamu sarduudha.
mt: The Iraqi government has been accused of using chemical weapons against its own people.
ref: The Report is highly critical of almost every aspect of the present policy of the Executive towards Iraq and it urges an immediate change of direction.

src: Dhuma waggaa kanaa dura hojiin daangaa Iraaq baqattootarraa bilisa baasuu Ajajawwan haaraa jalqabaa 78 kaka’umsi hojii diippilomaasii fudhatamuu qaba fi giddu seenuun fi diippiloomasii biyyoota ollaa waliin deebisanii dhaabuufi.
mt: 78 Iraqi students have been awarded diplomas in various fields of study, including engineering, medicine and other fields.
ref: First among its 78 recommendations is that a new diplomatic initiative should be taken before the end of this year to secure Iraq’s borders against hostile interventions and to re-establish diplomatic relations with its neighbors.

src: Seenataari amma fi Giifti Dureen Arjaantiinaa Kiristiinaa Fernaandez dii Kirchiner akka Piraazidantumma irratti hirmaatu kaleessa galgalaa, magaalaa Boones Ayiirees irraa kiloometiraa 50 (maayilii 31) fagaatu Laa Pilaataa keessatti beeksisteetti .
mt: 50 kilometers (31 miles) from Buenos Aires, the city of La Plata, Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner was elected president of Argentina.
ref: Current senator and Argentine First Lady Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her presidential candidacy yesterday evening in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) away from Buenos Aires.

src: Aadde Kirchiiner Tiyatirii Arjentinaatti pirezdaantii ta’uuf akka dorgoman yaada isaanii beeksisanii jiru, bakkee walfakaatuttiis duula bakka bu’aa mana maree ishee miseensa Bonoo saayrasii taatee kan 2005 jalqabde.
mt: The Argentine government has denied reports that the country’s president, Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner, has been diagnosed with cancer, but has confirmed that she has undergone surgery.
ref: Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at the Argentine Theatre, the same location she used to start her 2005 campaign for the Senate as member of the Buenos Aires province delegation.

src: Falmichi kan qabsiifame walmamsiinsa baasii boqochiisaa fi ijaarsa irradeebii Obomboleettii Kaatiriinaafi: kan galiin konservaatotaa gammachuun “Waliigaltee Niwu Oorliinsii Buush” jechuun kahan.
mt: The 2016 Republican presidential candidate and conservative commentator, who has been criticized for his comments on women, said “I don’t think there’s a difference between a woman and a man.”
ref: The debate was sparked by controversy over spending on relief and reconstruction in the wake Hurricane Katrina; which some fiscal conservatives have humorously labeled "Bush's New Orleans Deal."

src: Komii libiraalizimiin carraaqqii deebi’anii ijaaruu irratti qabu kan inni xiyyeeffatee jiru waliigalteewwan deebi’anii ijaaruu warra Waashingitaniin waan keessa beekan fakkaatan badhaasuu irratti.
mt: Liberal Democrats leader Nick Clegg has said he is “very proud” of the party’s record in government, as he was grilled by voters in a live TV debate.
ref: Liberal criticism of the reconstruction effort has focused on the awarding of reconstruction contracts to perceived Washington insiders.

src: Namoota miliiyoona afuri oltu awwalchicha irratti hirmaachuf deeme.
mt: 1 million dollars in cash was stolen from a bank.
ref: Over four million people went to Rome to attend the funeral.

src: Lakkoofsi namootaa garmalee hedduu waan tureef Addababayii Qulqulluu Pheexiroositti namni hundi awwaalcha sana bira ga’uu hindandeenye.
mt: 20 people were injured in a stampede at the Addis Ababa Pharaohs football stadium.
ref: The number of people present was so large that it was not possible for everybody to gain access to the funeral in St. Peter's Square.

src: Room keessatti bakka baay’eeti foddaa teelevizhiniin gurguddaa baayeen dhaabbataniiru akka ummatnii qophii sana ilaalaniif.
mt: The room was filled with television sets, which were all tuned to the same channel.
ref: Several large television screens were installed in various places in Rome to let the people watch the ceremony.

src: Magaalota Xaaliyaanii kan biroo hedduu kessattii fi addunyaa hafte irrattis, keessattuu Poolaandii keessa, qindaa’inna walfakkaataan tolchame, kunis namoota baay’eedhaan kan illaalamu dha.
mt: The city of Kharkiv, which is the second largest in Ukraine, and the country’s largest industrial center, has been under attack for days, and the city’s residents are fleeing.
ref: In many other cities of Italy and in the rest of the world, particularly in Poland, similar setups were made, which were viewed by a great number of people.

src: Kanneen seenaa beekan qeeqaniiru seerotaa FBI qabeenya irratti xiyyeeffachu isaaniif dhimmoota salphaati furamuu danda’aniif, keessumaa waa’ee makiinawwan haatamanii, yaada milkaa’ina ejansiicha ol kaasuf.
mt: The FBI is investigating the shooting of a man who was found dead in a car in a parking lot at the airport.
ref: Historians have criticized past FBI policies for focusing resources on cases which are easy to solve, especially stolen car cases, with the intent of boosting the agency's success rate.

src: Koongireesiin bara bajataa 2005 keessa hojii safuun keessa hinjirrerratti maallaqa dhangalaasuu eegale, akkasumas FBI n hojjettoota isaa 10 saalquunnamtiii ga’eessotaatiif dabarsee akka kennu adda baasee ibse.
mt: 2005, the FBI was investigating the case, and the suspect was arrested in 2010.
ref: Congress began funding the obscenity initiative in fiscal 2005 and specified that the FBI must devote 10 agents to adult pornography.

src: Roobin Utihappaan qabxii dabarecha keessatti qabxii isa olaanaa galmesse, kubbaawwan 41 qofaa keessatti fiigichawwan 70 afuroota 11 fi jahoota 2 rukutuudhaan.
mt: 41 people were killed and 70 were injured, including 11 children and two infants.
ref: Robin Uthappa made the innings highest score, 70 runs in just 41 balls by hitting 11 fours and 2 sixes.

src: Taphattoonni giddugalaa tapha kiriiteek Saachiin Teendalkar fi Raahul Draaviid akka gaariitti taphate akkasumas waliigaltee fiigicha-dhibbaa godhe.
mt: 2 people were killed and 3 others injured in a road accident involving a truck and a car in Sachin Tendulkar’s hometown Navi Mumbai.
ref: Middle order batsmen, Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid, performed well and made a hundred-run partnership.

src: Garuu, erga kaappiteenii wiikeetii dhabdeen booda Indiyaan marsicha xumuruuf dhabiinsa 7aan fiigicha 36 gooteeti.
mt: 7 people were killed and 36 injured in the blast.
ref: But, after losing the captain's wicket India only made 36 runs loosing 7 wickets to end the innings.

src: Piraazidantiin U.S George W. Bush ganama Sadaasa 16 Singaapoor ga’aan, imaala daawwannaa torbaniif turu kan Eeshiyaa jalqabanii.
mt: 16 September Singapore, U.S President George W. Bush will attend a summit on terrorism in Asia.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore the morning of November 16, beginning a week-long tour of Asia.

src: Inni Itti aanaa Muummicha Ministeeraa Singaappoor Wong Kan Seng’n wal dubbisee, Muummicha ministeeraa Singaappoor ,waliin dhimma daldalaa fi shorokeessummaa irratti mari'ate.
mt: Singapore’s Health Minister, Wong Kan Seng, said the country’s health system was “not perfect” and needed to be improved.
ref: He was greeted by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng and discussed trade and terrorism issues with the Singapore Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong.

src: Walakkaa filannoo keessatti erga mo’umsa torban tokkoo booda, Bush hordoftootatti waa'ee Eeshiyaa keessatti daldala babal'isuu dubbate.
mt: In a speech to the United Nations General Assembly, Bush said the world must act to stop Iran from developing nuclear weapons.
ref: After a week of losses in the midterm election, Bush told an audience about the expansion of trade in Asia.

src: Muummeen Ministeera Isteefan Harpeer waraqa seeraa ‘Hojii qilleensa qulqullu’ miseensa komiteewwan hundumaati erguuf waliif galaniiru, yeroo lammaffaf osoo hin dubbifamiin, walgahii Facaasa daqiiqa 25 boode duraa ta’an NDP Jaak Leeyitan bakka PMO’tti erga geggeessanii.
mt: 25 minutes ago, NDP leader Jack Layton announced that he will resign as leader of the NDP and as a member of Parliament, effective immediately.
ref: Prime Minister Stephen Harper has agreed to send the government's 'Clean Air Act' to an all-party committee for review, before its second reading, after Tuesday's 25 minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton at the PMO.

src: Leeyitaan yeroo walgahii PM waliin godheetti seerri qilleensa naannoorratti warra seera cimsitootaan dhiiffame akka jijjiiramuu fi seerri kunuunsa naannoo paartii Konsarvatiivii “irradeebiin gadifageenyaa fi guutummaatti akka barreeffamuuf,”gaafatee ture.
mt: The prime minister’s office said the prime minister was “attacked by a mob of protesters and his convoy was blocked by a group of Conservative Party supporters,” according to a statement.
ref: Layton had asked for changes to the conservatives' environmental bill during the meeting with the PM, asking for a "thorough and complete rewriting" of the Conservative party's environmental bill.

src: Erga Mootummaan Federaalaa hospitaala Meersii Diivanpoorti, Tasmaaniyaa keessaatiif gargaarsa maallaqaa gochuuf itti ce’ee of jala galchee as, mootummaan biyyichaatii fi miseensonni paarlaamaa federaalaa tokko tokko gocha kana filannoo federaalaa Sadaasa keessaa dhufaa jiruuf kan ittiin qalbii namaa hatanidha jechuun qeeqanii jiru.
mt: The Federal Government’s Department of Health and Ageing, in conjunction with the Federal Parliament’s Health and Ageing Committee, has released a report on the Federal Government’s response to the 2009 swine flu pandemic.
ref: Ever since the Federal Government stepped in to take over funding of the Mersey hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs have criticised this act as a stunt in the prelude to the federal election to be called by November.

src: Garuu Muummichi Ministeeraa Joon Haawaardi gochichi kan raawwatame maallaqa dabalataa miiliyoona AUD$45 kennuudhaan mootummaan Tasmaaniyaa meeshaalee hospitaalichaa akka hinxiqqeessineef eegumsa gochuufii qofaafidha jedhan.
mt: 45 million Australian dollars is the amount of money the Tasmanian government has been accused of withholding from the state’s hospitals.
ref: But Prime Minister John Howard has said the act was only to safeguard the facilities of the hospital from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government, in giving an extra AUD$45 million.

src: Akka ibsa yeroo dhiyoo ba’eetti, dubbisoonni qixa galaanaa, sunaamiin akka uumame agarsiisu. Tateewwan sunaamii sirrii qarqara Paagoo Paagoo fi Nuweettii waraabamaniiru.
mt: The storm is expected to bring heavy rain, flooding and high winds to the area. The storm is named Pagasa and Nokto.
ref: According to the latest bulletin, sea level readings indicated a tsunami was generated. There was some definite tsunami activity recorded near Pago Pago and Niue.

src: Miidhaan guddaan yookiin cabiinsi Toongaa keessatti gabaafame hin jiru, garuu humni ibsaa yeroof badee ture, kun immoo itti gaafatamtootni Toongaa akeekachiisa Suunamii PTWC dhaan darbu akka hin fudhanne taasise.
mt: There is no tsunami warning for Tonga, but the Pacific Tsunami Warning Center says a tsunami has been observed.
ref: No major damage or injuries have been reported in Tonga, but power was temporarily lost, which reportedly prevented Tongan authorities from receiving the tsunami warning issued by the PTWC.

src: Manneen barnoota kudha afur kan Hawaayii tti ykn naannoo sanatti argaman gaafaa Roobi cufa dha yooma akeekachisnee kennameera ta’eeyyu.
mt: 12 students from Hawaii were on the plane, which was bound for the island of Roatan.
ref: Fourteen schools in Hawaii located on or near coastlines were closed all of Wednesday despite the warnings being lifted.

src: Pirezidaantiin U.S. Joorji W. Buush ibsicha fudhatan.
mt: U.S. President George W. Bush is in the hospital.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush welcomed the announcement.

src: Dubbii himaan Buush kan Goorden Joondirooyin waadaa kooriyaa Kibba “galmaa akka niwuukilaarii dhaabuud Kooriyaa peninsula akka raagaasisaniif akka taarkanfataan yaadachisedha” jechuun waamaniiru.
mt: The U.S. military said it was “conducting a routine operation” in the Koriya Peninsula, which is home to the North Korean capital Pyongyang.
ref: Bush spokesman Gordon Johndroe called North Korea's pledge "a major step towards the goal of achieving the verifiable denuclearization of the Korean peninsula."

src: Bubbeen kudhanaffaa waqtii Obomboleettii Atilaantikii kan jedhame, bubbee tiroopikii gadii Jerii, har’a galaana Atilaantikitti argame.
mt: The explosion occurred at a time when the city was celebrating the feast of St. George, the patron saint of the city.
ref: The tenth named storm of the Atlantic Hurricane season, Subtropical Storm Jerry, formed in the Atlantic Ocean today.

src: Gidugaleessi Obomboleettii Biyyaalessaa (GHB) akka jedhetti yeroo kanatti jeeriin wanta laafaaf sodaachisu homaa hin qabu.
mt: The Ethiopian government has denied reports that it has been selling arms to Eritrea.
ref: The National Hurricane Center (NHC) says that at this point Jerry poses no threat to land.

src: Gareen Injinarootaa Loltuuwwan Yuunaayitid Isteetsi akka tilmaamanittii roobni inchii 6 itti laga qaqaratti ijaarame kan kanaan dura miidhame cabsuu danda’a jedhee tilmaame.
mt: 6 people were injured when a car crashed into a building in the city center.
ref: The U.S. Corps of Engineers estimated that 6 inches of rainfall could breach the previously damaged levees.

src: Naayinz Waard, kan yeroo obomboleettii Katriinaa lolaa haga faana 20 olka’ee arge, amma bishaan mudhii-ga’u olka’eera akkuma afaan galaanaa guutee irra yaa’e.
mt: 20 people are reported missing, but the death toll is expected to rise to 100 as the storm moves inland.
ref: The Ninth Ward, which saw flooding as high as 20 feet during Hurricane Katrina, is currently in waist-high water as the nearby levee was overtopped.

src: Bishaan hidhii daangaa isaarra ba’ee kutaa fiitii 100 bal’atuun dhangala’aa jira.
mt: 100 people are reported dead.
ref: Water is spilling over the levee in a section 100 feet wide.

src: Hogganaan gamoo Adam Cuerden, Wikinews irratti ji'a darbe dhimma balleeffamuu irratti sodaa qabu ibsate.
mt: The pilot was identified as Adam Cuerden, a Wikinews contributor.
ref: Commons Administrator Adam Cuerden expressed his frustration over the deletions when he spoke to Wikinews last month.

src: Dheekkamsi hawaasaa carraaqqiiwwan imaammata marsariitii qabiyyee saalquunnamtii qabanii kan miidiyaalee eyyemaan banaman miiliyoonotaan lakkaawwaman qopheessan ammaaf sababa ta’eera.
mt: The death toll from the attack has risen to 20, according to local media, but the government has not confirmed the figure.
ref: The community irritation led to current efforts to draft a policy regarding sexual content for the site which hosts millions of openly-licensed media.

src: Hojiin hojjatame caalaatti kan tiyooriiti, garuu sagantichi kan barreeffame qorannoo gaalaaksii Saagitaariyaas fakkeessuuf.
mt: The report was initially denied by the Saudi government.
ref: The work done was mostly theoretical, but the program was written to simulate observations made of the Sagittarius galaxy.

src: Bu’aa gareen barbaachaa ture , humna dambalii maatarii gurraa galaaksichaa fi maatarii gurraachaa Milk Weeyiin uumame.
mt: The galaxy is 2.5 billion light-years away and the Milky Way is 2.5 billion light-years away.
ref: The effect the team was looking for would be caused by tidal forces between the galaxy's dark matter and the Milky Way's dark matter.

src: Akkuma ji’i lafa irratti harkisageggeessitu, raafamaa kaasuudhaan, akkasuma Milkii Weey gaalaaksii Saajitaariyes irratti humna gad dhiisa.
mt: The plane was carrying 100 passengers and crew, including the singer Milkhae Weey.
ref: Just like the moon exerts a pull on the earth, causing tides, so does the Milky Way exert a force on the Sagittarius galaxy.

src: Qorattoonni akka goolabuu danda’anitti akkuma wantoota dhaabbii dukkanni tokko dukkana biraa ni huba.
mt: The researchers say the device could be used to diagnose a range of diseases, including breast cancer, tuberculosis, HIV and malaria, in countries where survival rates for illnesses such as breast cancer can be half those of richer countries.
ref: The scientists were able to conclude that the dark matter affect other dark matter in the same way regular matter does.

src: Tiyooriin kun maateriin baay’ee gurraachi naannoo Gaalaksii kan argaman naannoo gaalaksii haala haalootiini jedha, paartikiloota xixiqqoo hedduu irraas tolchame.
mt: The material is a new type of glass that can be made in a variety of colors, and is made from particles that are arranged in a specific way.
ref: This theory says that most dark matter around a galaxy is located around a galaxy in a kind of halo, and is made of lots of small particles.

src: Gabaasaaleen Televiziyoonii aarri adiin ijaarsicha keessaa dhufaa akka jiru argisiisu.
mt: The television station’s website is down.
ref: Television reports show white smoke coming from the plant.

src: Hoggantoonni naannawaa jiraattota naannoo biqiltootaa jiraatan mana akka turan akeekkachisan, haaromsituu qilleensaa cufaa akkasumas bishaan uujummoo hin dhuginaa.
mt: The airport was closed to commercial flights after the crash, and the runway was closed for several hours.
ref: Local authorities are warning residents in the vicinity of the plant to stay indoors, turn off air-conditioners and not to drink tap water.

src: Akka Ejansii nuukileera Jaappanitti jedhutti,raadiyoo aktiiv Seeziyeemifi ayoodiiniin warshaa keessatti adda baafamaniiru.
mt: According to Japanese media, a man in his 60s was found dead in a car parked in a parking lot.
ref: According to Japan's nuclear agency, radioactive caesium and iodine has been identified at the plant.

src: Akka hoggantoonni tilmaamanitti kontiineeriin boba’aa yuraniiyem baatuu kun bakkeetti tarii uratee akkasumas yaaseera ta’a.
mt: The pilot was also a flight instructor and had more than 2,000 hours of flying experience.
ref: Authorities speculate that this indicates that containers holding uranium fuel at the site may have ruptured and are leaking.

src: Doktar Toonii Mool Tuuberkiloosisii (XDR-TB) qoricha akka malee dandamatu naannoo Afrikaa Aibbaa Kuwazuuluu Naataali keessatti argate.
mt: Dr. Tooni Mool, a tuberculosis expert, said the disease is spreading in the African nation of South Africa.
ref: Dr. Tony Moll discovered the Extremely Drug Resistant Tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the South African region KwaZulu-Natal.

src: Gaafiif deebii keessatti, inni jijiramnii haaraa ”kan baay’ee jeequu fi dammaqsu ture, sababa saffisa du’iinsa guddaatiin.” jedhe.
mt: ”The fire was caused by a short circuit in the electrical system,” the statement said.
ref: In an interview, he said the new variant was "very highly troubling and alarming because of the very high fatality rate."

src: Dhukkubsatootni muraasni tarii waan faalama kana waliin wal qunnamani ta’u danda’a, Dr. Mool akka yaadaniti, fi yoo xiqqaate lamaan isaanii hojjetoota fayyaa Hospitaala turani.
mt: The hospital’s chief executive, Dr. Mool, said the hospital was prepared for the worst, and that the hospital was ready to receive patients from the blast.
ref: Some patients might have contracted the bug in the hospital, Dr. Moll thinks, and at least two were hospital health workers.
